page.title: 14Shops in Cromford
page.content: We interviewed two ladies. The first lady we interviewed said she usually shops at{U-select}and if{U-select haven't got what she wants then she goes to{Arkwright's.}She hardly ever goes in{Goeff's, The Top shop}or {Howards}the bakerey. She goes down twice a week. She never goes in{Video shop because she has not got a video. The other lady usually goes to{The {Top shop}and if they haven't got what she wants she goes to{Goeff's.}She never goes in{U- select}or {Arkwright's.}She has never been in {Art's and Craft's}because she has two three year old boys. She usually goes in the{video shop}for she has a video.
